mkpsf module¶

Make a PSF

usage:

mkpsf.py [-h|–help] -a apt -w wfe -s spec -c cntl -p psf.fits

options:
--help

show this help message and exit

-a apt

aperture mask

-w wfe

wfe map or null

-s spec

electrons/sec/um at lambada

-c cntl

control parameter

-p psf.fits

Previous topic

mkplanetlc module

Next topic

mkresponse module
